chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f1 : R -> R -> R) (f2 f3 : R -> R) (x l1x l1y l2 l3 : R), differentiable_pt_lim f1 (f2 x) (f3 x) l1x l1y -> derivable_pt_lim f2 x l2 -> derivable_pt_lim f3 x l3 -> derivable_pt_lim (fun t : R => f1 (f2 t) (f3 t)) x (l1x * l2 + l1y * l3)

Premises:
differentiable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y - (lx * (u - x) + ly * (v - y))) <= eps * Rmax (Rabs (u - x)) (Rabs (v - y))) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope]
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
ClassicalFacts.f1 : forall A B : Prop, ClassicalFacts.retract A B -> A -> B
derivable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists delta : posreal, forall h : R, h <> 0 -> Rabs h < delta -> Rabs ((f (x + h) - f x) / h - l) < eps : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope _]
ClassicalFacts.f2 : forall A B : Prop, ClassicalFacts.retract A B -> B -> A
*** [ R : Set ]
differentiable_pt_lim_comp : forall (f1 f2 f3 : R -> R -> R) (x y l1x l1y l2x l2y l3x l3y : R), differentiable_pt_lim f1 (f2 x y) (f3 x y) l1x l1y -> differentiable_pt_lim f2 x y l2x l2y -> differentiable_pt_lim f3 x y l3x l3y -> differentiable_pt_lim (fun u v : R => f1 (f2 u v) (f3 u v)) x y (l1x * l2x + l1y * l3x) (l1x * l2y + l1y * l3y)
derivable_pt_lim_div : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f1 x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f2 x l2 -> f2 x <> 0 -> derivable_pt_lim (f1 / f2) x ((l1 * f2 x - l2 * f1 x) / (f2 x)²)
derivable_pt_lim_comp : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f1 x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f2 (f1 x) l2 -> derivable_pt_lim (comp f2 f1) x (l2 * l1)
derivable_pt_lim_mult : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f1 x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f2 x l2 -> derivable_pt_lim (f1 * f2) x (l1 * f2 x + f1 x * l2)
derivable_pt_lim_plus : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f1 x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f2 x l2 -> derivable_pt_lim (f1 + f2) x (l1 + l2)
formule : forall (x h l1 l2 : R) (f1 f2 : R -> R), h <> 0 -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (f1 (x + h) / f2 (x + h) - f1 x / f2 x) / h - (l1 * f2 x - l2 * f1 x) / (f2 x)² = / f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1) + l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h)) - f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2) + l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2c -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
comp = fun (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) => f1 (f2 x) : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2d ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
differentiable_pt_lim_ext : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f1 u v = f2 u v) x y -> differentiable_pt_lim f1 x y lx ly -> differentiable_pt_lim f2 x y lx ly
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> l1 <> 0 -> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
mult_fct = fun (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) => f1 x * f2 x : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x y l : R), derivable_pt_lim f x l -> differentiable_pt_lim (fun u _ : R => f u) x y l 0
differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x y l : R), differentiable_pt_lim (fun u _ : R => f u) x y l 0 -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
plus_fct = fun (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) => f1 x + f2 x : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
uniqueness_step2 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), derivable_pt_lim f x l -> limit1_in (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (fun h : R => h <> 0) l 0
uniqueness_step3 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (fun h : R => h <> 0) l 0 -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
div_fct = fun (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) => f1 x / f2 x : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
derivable_pt_lim_D_in : forall (f df : R -> R) (x : R), D_in f df no_cond x < -> derivable_pt_lim f x (df x)
Dmult : forall (D : R -> Prop) (df dg f g : R -> R) (x0 : R), D_in f df D x0 -> D_in g dg D x0 -> D_in (fun x : R => f x * g x) (fun x : R => df x * g x + f x * dg x) D x0
derivable_pt_abs = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => derivable_pt_lim f x l : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope R_scope]
is_derive_Reals : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_derive f x l < -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
is_linear_prod : forall (l1 : ?T -> ?U) (l2 : ?T -> ?V), is_linear l1 -> is_linear l2 -> is_linear (fun t : ?T => (l1 t, l2 t)) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?T : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
filterdiff_differentiable_pt_lim : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), filterdiff (fun u : R * R => f (fst u) (snd u)) (locally (x, y)) (fun u : R * R => fst u * lx + snd u * ly) < -> differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly
limit_plus : forall (f g : R -> R) (D : R -> Prop) (l l' x0 : R), limit1_in f D l x0 -> limit1_in g D l' x0 -> limit1_in (fun x : R => f x + g x) D (l + l') x0
differentiable_pt_lim_unique : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly -> Derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 y) x = lx /\ Derive (fun y0 : R => f x y0) y = ly
Derive = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => Rbar.real (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (Rbar.Finite 0)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
differentiable_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => exists lx ly : R, differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Dgf = fun (Df Dg : R -> Prop) (f : R -> R) (x : R) => Df x /\ Dg (f x) : (R -> Prop) -> (R -> Prop) -> (R -> R) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope function_scope R_scope]
continuity_2d_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
differentiable_continuity_pt : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), differentiable_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y
Dcomp : forall (Df Dg : R -> Prop) (df dg f g : R -> R) (x0 : R), D_in f df Df x0 -> D_in g dg Dg (f x0) -> D_in (fun x : R => g (f x)) (fun x : R => df x * dg (f x)) (Dgf Df Dg f) x0
derivable_continuous_pt : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f x -> continuity_pt f x
is_linear_comp : forall (l1 : ?U -> ?V) (l2 : ?V -> ?W), is_linear l1 -> is_linear l2 -> is_linear (fun x : ?U => l2 (l1 x)) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?W : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
D_in = fun (f d : R -> R) (D : R -> Prop) (x0 : R) => limit1_in (fun x : R => (f x - f x0) / (x - x0)) (D_x D x0) (d x0) x0 : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope function_scope R_scope]
locally_2d_impl : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
derivable_pt = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => {l : R | derivable_pt_abs f x l} : (R -> R) -> R -> Set Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R

```coq
intros f1 f2 f3 x l1x l1y l2 l3 H1 H2 H3.
apply differentiable_pt_lim_comp with (f1 := f1) (f2 := f2) (f3 := f3) (x := x); assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros f1 f2 f3 x l1x l1y l2 l3 H1 H2 H3. apply differentiable_pt_lim_comp with (f1 := f1) (f2 := f2) (f3 := f3) (x := x); auto.
